questions.question: ………………. with milk and sugar, it makes a delicious breakfast.
questions.description: The complete sentence is 'When it is served with milk and sugar....'

questions.question: Most of the people ……………… to the party were neighbors.
questions.description: The complete sentence is 'Most of the people who were invited to the party...'

questions.question: Not ………………. what to do, I called the doctor.
The professor is …………………. by his students.
questions.description: This is a passive construction and it is constructed with a past participle.

questions.question: I was ………………….. by the way she spoke to me.
questions.description: We make passive constructions with past participles.

questions.question: I found her sitting at a table ……………… with papers.
questions.description: The complete sentence is 'I found her sitting at a table that was covered with papers'.

questions.question: I was very ..................... by her performance.
questions.description: We make passive constructions with past participle forms.

questions.question: Her performance was really ………………..
questions.description: Ing forms are used to make present and past continuous tense forms.

questions.question: The first runner came in closely ………………….. by the second.
